description: The Trezor Model T is an advanced cryptocurrency hardware wallet. Store Bitcoin, passwords, tokens and other keys with confidence. Invented for your digital independence.
The Trezor Model T is an advanced cryptocurrency hardware wallet. Store Bitcoin, passwords, tokens and other keys with confidence. Invented for your digital independence.
The Trezor Model One is the most secure hardware wallet choice for everyone, whether you're new to Bitcoin or already an expert. Get yours today!
An exclusive Trezor Model One device handmade from anodized aluminum, with an engraving commemorating the 5th anniversary of SatoshiLabs, the makers of Trezor.
